item_tooltip.the_last_sword.mode_descr: Press Shift to expand the introduction
item_tooltip.the_last_sword.normal_mode_: In this mode, left-click can mine most mineable blocks, and right-click can shoot projectiles, dealing damage based on extra attack damage.
item_tooltip.the_last_sword.powerful_min: In this mode, right-click can mine almost all blocks. Use with caution!
resourcepack.the_last_sword.desc: The Last Sword Classical Texture Pack
item_tooltip.the_last_sword.powerful_ran: In this mode, right-click to deal 'Absolute Destruction' damage based on the extra attack damage value to configured targets within the configured range. *'Absolute Destruction': This damage ignores vanilla damage reduction effects and adds an 'Absolute Health' value to entities the first time they receive Absolute Destruction damage. When Absolute Health is less than or equal to 0, the 'The Last Dead' event is triggered immediately.
